name: King Soulja Run - For Soulja Boy
name_original: King Soulja Run - For Soulja Boy
description:
King Soulja Run is a Simple & very challenging endless runner game.

Features-
~~~~~~~
- Tap on the screen to move up and down.
- Make high scores.
- Share the scores on social network.
- Run through iconic locations.

If you enjoy endless runner game, you will definitely love this game.

Having any problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at support at - contact@digitalhole.co
